org.libgit2.jagged.core

Class Ensure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.libgit2.jagged.core.Ensure

  • public final class Ensure
extends Object
    Static utility methods for checking method inputs and outputs for valid states. Unlike assertions (the language keyword) these keywords remain in production.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void argument(boolean valid, String expression)
      Throws IllegalArgumentException if the given value is not valid.
      static void argumentNotNegative(int value, String name)

      Throws NullPointerException if the given object is null.
      static void argumentNotNullOrEmpty(String str, String name)
      Throws NullPointerException if the given object is null or IllegalArgumentException if the given object is of zero length.
      static void nativeBooleanResult(int result)
      Ensures that the int result from a native libgit2 call is a boolean result (0 or 1).
      static void nativeNotNull(NativeHandle handle) 
      static void nativeNotNull(Object obj) 
      static void nativePositiveResult(int result)
      Ensures that the int result from a native libgit2 call is a positive result (greater than 0).
